channel.title: [PI] Shops help [PI]
channel.description: alright so I'm trying to add a Donator shop, but after I add all the items to the shop, I log on and there are no items in the shop? help. And also, how do I make it a Donator only shop? Where non-donators get a message saying that they cant trade that npc.

item.title: [PI] Shops help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Sanskrit Sanskrit
item.description:
@Sanskrit wrote:

open npc2.py and add this.

def npcClick2_NPC_ID(c, npcId && donator == 1): c.getShops().openShop(SHOP_ID)

obviously, the npc id is the id of the non player character who is hosting the donator shop, and the shop id is the id of the shop in shops.cfg. change the “donator” variable to whatever variable you use for member or donator status.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Shops help [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ground_zero_317 Ground zero 317
item.description:
@Ground_zero_317 wrote:

um you put the items on the right npc like the npc id and then u cant make it where only certain people trade i suggest make a donor tele and the shop there.
